mapper.insert: insert into contractdetails(cust_code, code, contract_name, start_time, end_time, term, total_money, status, type, memo, manager_code, operator_code, operator_name, update_time, create_time) values (#{custCode}, #{code}, #{contractName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{term}, #{totalMoney}, #{status}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{managerCode}, #{operatorCode}, #{operatorName}, #{updateTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select concat('第', count(*) + 1, '号合同') ss from contractdetails;
select * from contractdetails where status = '01' and #{curTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= date_add(end_time, interval ${invalidContractOverTime} day)
select count(*) from contractdetails where status !='00' and cust_code =#{custCode};
